Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface
public class Controller extends Object implements ControllerInterface
The implementation of Controller. Its processCommand method handles the cases for each of the possible commands this program accepts - see SETUP-README.txt for documentation of commands.
